title: Food Deserts (Ken Kolb)
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description: In this episode, we discuss unequal access to healthy food, activitism, and public policy with Ken Kolb (Furman University). Ken is the author of Retail Inequality: Reframing the Food Desert Debate (University of California Press).
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, we discuss unequal access to healthy food, activitism, and public policy with Ken Kolb (Furman University).  Ken is the author of Retail Inequality: Reframing the Food Desert Debate (University of California Press).
